params.account: The account for which to credit the deposit.
params.amount: the amount of tokens to deposit.

params.account: The address of the account to query the balances of.
The address of the account to query the index of.

getFinalSettlementEnabled().return: True if final-settlement was enabled, false otherwise.

getFunderContract().return: The address of the funder contract.

getGlobalIndex().return: The most recently cached global index.

params.operator: The address of the operator to query the status of.

getIsGlobalOperator(address).return: True if the address is a global operator, false otherwise.

params.account: The account to query the operator for.
params.operator: The address of the operator to query the status of.

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).return: True if the operator is a local operator of the account, false otherwise.

getMinCollateral().return: The minimum-acceptable collateralization ratio, returned as a fixed-point number with 18 decimals of precision.

getOracleContract().return: The address of the price oracle contract.

getOraclePrice().details: Only able to be called by global operators.
getOraclePrice().return: The price returned by the current price oracle.

getTokenContract().return: The address of the ERC20 token.

hasAccountPermissions(address,address).return: True if the operator has permission to operate the account,                  and false otherwise.

params.approved: True for approval, false for disapproval.
params.operator: The account that is approved or disapproved.

params.accounts: The sorted list of accounts that are involved in trades.
params.trades: The list of trades to execute in-order.

params.account: The account for which to debit the withdrawal.
params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.destination: The address to which the tokens are transferred.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit some amount of margin tokens from the msg.sender into an account.

getAccountBalance(address).notice: Get the balance of an account, without accounting for changes in the index.

getAccountIndex(address).notice: Gets the most recently cached index of an account.

getFinalSettlementEnabled().notice: Gets the status of whether final-settlement was initiated by the Admin.

getFunderContract().notice: Gets the current address of the funder contract.

getGlobalIndex().notice: Gets the most recently cached global index.

getIsGlobalOperator(address).notice: Gets the global operator status of an address.

getIsLocalOperator(address,address).notice: Gets the local operator status of an operator for a particular account.

getMinCollateral().notice: Gets minimum collateralization ratio of the protocol.

getOracleContract().notice: Gets the current address of the price oracle contract.

getOraclePrice().notice: Gets the price returned by the oracle.

getTokenContract().notice: Gets the address of the ERC20 margin contract used for margin deposits.

hasAccountPermissions(address,address).notice: Gets whether an address has permissions to operate an account.

setLocalOperator(address,bool).notice: Grants or revokes permission for another account to perform certain actions on behalf of the sender.

trade(address[],(uint256,uint256,address.notice: Submits one or more trades between any number of accounts.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw some amount of margin tokens from an account to a destination address.

withdrawFinalSettlement().notice: Withdraw the number of margin tokens equal to the value of the account at the time that final settlement occurred.
